line_1: 'Tis very severe to make Beauty petition:
'Tis very severe to make Beauty petition:
My lady heard their joint petition,
line_2: She'd issue out her high commission
Nor when true fondness, with submisison

line_1: To heav'n send many a vague petition;
Perhaps may induce you to read my petition:
line_2: O BEST of good masters, your mild disposition
